slide.title: Benchmark again
slide.example: |0077aa|~>| *siege -c 5 -b -t30s "http://wp2.localhost/?p=1"* ** SIEGE 2.70 ** Preparing 5 concurrent users for battle. The server is now under siege... Lifting the server siege.. done. Transactions: 2331 hits Availability: 100.00 % Elapsed time: 29.40 secs Data transferred: 18.82 MB Response time: *0.06 secs* Transaction rate: *79.29 trans/sec* Throughput: 0.64 MB/sec Concurrency: 4.99 Successful transactions: 2331 Failed transactions: 0 Longest transaction: 0.12 Shortest transaction: 0.02
